resources.string: We help you improve your fish farming business.
Keep track of the fish progress in your farm by monitoring the monthly feeding and growth of the fish.
We provide a market for you to sell your fish
Not sure about where you can sell your fish? Let us know when they are ready of harvesting and we will come do the work and pay you.
Order feeds from anywhere directly from your phone.
Through our marketplace, you can order fish feeds and we will deliver directly to your farm.
